mainTitle.title: Sensors of medical and biological information

instruction.paragraph1: Before starting work, it is necessary to connect the layout to the network, then we can choose what exactly we need for testing (strain sensor, temperature sensor or photoresistor).
instruction.paragraph2: If we need a strain gauge, we select the number 1 (strain gauge serial number), select the strain gauge under the layout, and select the weight of the weight.
instruction.paragraph3: If we need a temperature sensor, we select the number 2 (the temperature sensor's serial number), select the temperature sensor under the layout and press <Start>, wait a few seconds, after which the graph is built.
instruction.paragraph4: If we need a photoresistor, we choose the number 4 (the photoresistor serial number), choose the photoresistor under the layout, choose the area of ​​the circle.
instruction.paragraph5: To reset all results and repeat the experiment, you need to reload the page.

connectModel.title: Connect the layout to the network

photoresistorTitle.title: Select the area of the circle
